title: NO2 + CO - rate law consistent with mechanism

content.question: The reaction between NO2(g) and CO(g) is represented above. The elementary steps of a proposed reaction mechanism are represented below. Step 1: 2 NO2(g) → NO(g) + NO3(g) (slow) Step 2: NO3(g) + CO(g) → NO2(g) + CO2(g) (fast) Which of the following is the rate law for the overall reaction that is consistent with the proposed mechanism?

skill.text: 4.D: Explain the degree to which a model or representation describes the connection between particulate-level properties and macroscopic properties.
